Posts.EditableText: Hi, I'm desperately trying to use som Javascript in Squiffy. The documentation says I can use Javascript by indenting it with one tab or four spaces, however when I do this it is simply rendered as a quote (in a grey box). I've tried using both the web version and the downloadable one. I've tried googling around, and it seems there once was a bug that was since fixed (https://github.com/textadventures/squiffy/issues/29) - however this apparently is the issue I'm experiencing now. Since I'm on OSX (El Capitan), my newlines are a bit different from the majority, so I wondered if this bug had resurfaced?

Hi,

I'm desperately trying to use som Javascript in Squiffy. The documentation says I can use Javascript by indenting it with one tab or four spaces, however when I do this it is simply rendered as a quote (in a grey box).

I've tried using both the web version and the downloadable one. I've tried googling around, and it seems there once was a bug that was since fixed (https://github.com/textadventures/squiffy/issues/29) - however this apparently is the issue I'm experiencing now.

Since I'm on OSX (El Capitan), my newlines are a bit different from the majority, so I wondered if this bug had resurfaced?

Posts.EditableText: Make sure it's at the top of the passage or section, before any of the displayed text.
